summary: This mod drastically raises all ingredient prices, including ingots and filled soulgems. Merchants have more gold and wares. Speechcraft-oriented gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
This mod drastically raises all ingredient prices, including ingots and filled soulgems.
So if you want to level your Alchemy, Smithing, or Enchanting using vendor\'s reagents,
you will need some perks of Speechcraft branch. Otherwise it\'ll be VERY expensive.

Prices are counted for all discount perks taken +20% discount from your equipment.

Black Soul Gems are for VIP-hunting only :-) Added to Falion in Morthal(10), Wunfert in Windhelm(10), Enthir n College(20).

At low levels some of Alchemy reagents better to sale than make smth of them.

Apothecaries have more ingredients than vanilla. Also they have especially much of ingredients common in their region.

Ingredient barrels, Falmers, Mages contain much more ingredients than vanilla.

10x Giant\'s Toes found will be a Jackpot!

Mage-Vendors have much more empty soulgems for sale.

All vendors have much more gold(Blacksmiths - 10000, Apothecaries - 15000, etc).

House prices also increased.

So feel the poverty or become a Master Dealer!

Known issue - if the vendor has more gold than some amount(I don\'t know how much exactly) it\'s useless to sell him smth - you won\'t get gold from him. 

Need to \"heal\" this merchant with some shock or wait till he reset himself(3 days). I think it\'s a bug of a game. Maybe it\'s the reason why they haven\'t enough gold in vanilla.

Please comment, maybe there is something to make it better.
author: romperpomper
